title: イベント概要
rawBody:
東京インディーズは、月１で個人ゲーム開発者で集まって、お互いのゲームを見せ合ったり意見交換をするのが目的のゆる～い飲み会です。
インディー、同人、学生、プロ、職種を問わずどなたでもゲームを作っている、もしくは興味があるという方なら大歓迎です！
開発者同士、作品を見せ合って生のフィードバックを得られるいい機会でもあります。
body: 東京インディーズは、月１で個人ゲーム開発者で集まって、お互いのゲームを見せ合ったり意見交換をするのが目的のゆる～い飲み会です。 インディー、同人、学生、プロ、職種を問わずどなたでもゲームを作っている、もしくは興味があるという方なら大歓迎です！ 開発者同士、作品を見せ合って生のフィードバックを得られるいい機会でもあります。
description: 東京インディーズは、月１で個人ゲーム開発者で集まって、お互いのゲームを見せ合ったり意見交換をするのが目的のゆる～い飲み会です。 インディー、同人、学生、プロ、職種を問わずどなたでもゲームを作っている、もしくは興味があるという方なら大歓迎です！ 開発者同士、作品を見せ合って生のフィードバックを得られるいい機会でもあります。

title: Tokyo Indies
rawBody:
Welcome to Tokyo Indies!

Tokyo Indies is a monthly gathering where game developers, creators, artists
and game fans can hang out and share their passion for games over a few (or
more) friendly drinks.  No matter your calling, be you indie, doujin, student,
corporate or wookiee, whether you love making games or just playing them. All
are welcome!  We offer time and space to present your games or just display
them for feedback and from time to time we will host unique speakers and
guests.
body:
Welcome to Tokyo Indies!

Tokyo Indies is a monthly gathering where game developers, creators, artists and game fans can hang out and share their passion for games over a few (or more) friendly drinks. No matter your calling, be you indie, doujin, student, corporate or wookiee, whether you love making games or just playing them. All are welcome! We offer time and space to present your games or just display them for feedback and from time to time we will host unique speakers and guests.

title: January Summary
rawBody:
Happy New Year Indies! Here's what happened this month:

The [Global Game Jam](http://globalgamejam.org/) is taking place January 20-22; there's still time to get in if you're interested.

[Hawken King](https://twitter.com/hawkun) presented a game made for the Nintendo Disk System!! He created a cartridge based on the soundtrack for his recently released game, [Pirate Pop Plus](http://store.steampowered.com/app/487350/).

Martin from Ninja Egg presented [Kyub](http://ninja-egg.com/kyub/), their action puzzle game available on XBox One and Windows. Using the power of elements and your brain you have to guide a cube through a series of bizarre and beautiful environments.

[Ryosuke Mihara](https://twitter.com/oinariman) talked about the [Pico-8](http://www.lexaloffle.com/pico-8.php) [Tiny TV Jam](http://www.lexaloffle.com/bbs/?tid=28480), in progress until the 22nd.

That was all this month, catch you next time!
body:
Happy New Year Indies! Here's what happened this month:

The Global Game Jam is taking place January 20-22; there's still time to get in if you're interested.

Hawken King presented a game made for the Nintendo Disk System!! He created a cartridge based on the soundtrack for his recently released game, Pirate Pop Plus.

Martin from Ninja Egg presented Kyub, their action puzzle game available on XBox One and Windows. Using the power of elements and your brain you have to guide a cube through a series of bizarre and beautiful environments.

Ryosuke Mihara talked about the Pico-8 Tiny TV Jam, in progress until the 22nd.

That was all this month, catch you next time!
description: Happy New Year Indies! Here's what happened this month:

title: Presentation Guidelines
rawBody:
Want to present at Tokyo Indies? You've come to the right place!

## Presentation Guidelines

- presentations start around 8PM
- please make your presentation around 10 minutes in length
- most people present from their own laptop; if you would prefer for us to show a video or file let us know in advance

The application form is [here](https://goo.gl/forms/msDrUsB3MuGDHss82). We look forward to hearing from you!
body:
Want to present at Tokyo Indies? You've come to the right place!

Presentation Guidelines

  • presentations start around 8PM
  • please make your presentation around 10 minutes in length
  • most people present from their own laptop; if you would prefer for us to show a video or file let us know in advance

The application form is here. We look forward to hearing from you!
description: Want to present at Tokyo Indies? You've come to the right place!

title: Access
rawBody: Tokyo Indies is held on the second floor of [Fab Cafe](http://fabcafe.com/tokyo/), near Shibuya Station.
body: Tokyo Indies is held on the second floor of Fab Cafe, near Shibuya Station.
description: Tokyo Indies is held on the second floor of Fab Cafe, near Shibuya Station.

title: TI 2016 12月
rawBody:
今月のプレゼンした方は下記通りになりました。

- CCC

title: プレゼンの申し込み
rawBody:
Tokyo Indiesは常にプレゼンターを募集しています。開発中の作品でも大歓迎なのでお気軽にご応募ください。

## プレゼンテーションについて

- プレゼンは20時ごろから始まります
- プレゼンは10分程度でお願いします
- プレゼンには基本各自のPCをご利用ください

応募フォームは[こちら](https://goo.gl/forms/k40Tthj7yXzmlh0H3)。
body:
Tokyo Indiesは常にプレゼンターを募集しています。開発中の作品でも大歓迎なのでお気軽にご応募ください。

プレゼンテーションについて

  • プレゼンは20時ごろから始まります
  • プレゼンは10分程度でお願いします
  • プレゼンには基本各自のPCをご利用ください

応募フォームはこちら。
description: Tokyo Indiesは常にプレゼンターを募集しています。開発中の作品でも大歓迎なのでお気軽にご応募ください。

title: About
rawBody:
Tokyo Indies is an event for Indies in Tokyo.

Tokyo Indies is a monthly gathering where game developers, creators, artists
and game fans can hang out and share their passion for games over a few (or
more) friendly drinks.  No matter your calling, be you indie, doujin, student,
corporate or wookiee, whether you love making games or just playing them. All
are welcome!  We offer time and space to present your games or just display
them for feedback and from time to time we will host unique speakers and
guests.
body:
Tokyo Indies is an event for Indies in Tokyo.

Tokyo Indies is a monthly gathering where game developers, creators, artists and game fans can hang out and share their passion for games over a few (or more) friendly drinks. No matter your calling, be you indie, doujin, student, corporate or wookiee, whether you love making games or just playing them. All are welcome! We offer time and space to present your games or just display them for feedback and from time to time we will host unique speakers and guests.
description: Tokyo Indies is an event for Indies in Tokyo.

title: アクセス
rawBody: Tokyo Indiesは渋谷の[Fab Cafe](http://fabcafe.com/tokyo/)の2FにあるMTRLに開催されます。
body: Tokyo Indiesは渋谷のFab Cafeの2FにあるMTRLに開催されます。
description: Tokyo Indiesは渋谷のFab Cafeの2FにあるMTRLに開催されます。
